Download your favourite Twitch Clips within Seconds !

Twitch Clip Downloader by Followerspanda is built in such way that the user can download clips hassle free with one click.

Why Choose Followerspanda's Twitch Clip Downloader?

✅ User-Friendly
Our interface offers a straightforward, efficient process that anyone can utilize. It's a Twitch clip download extension tool that doesn't require any technical knowledge to operate.

✅ Free to Use
We believe in providing a quality service to all Twitch users without any hidden charges. Our tool is 100% free, with no need to provide credit card or personal information.

✅ Convenient
Our Twitch Clip Downloader is not just about simplicity; it's also about convenience. The extension automatically recognizes the clip link on Twitch.tv and adds a download button to the page, helping you to quickly download videos.

Unlike other competitors, the Twitch Clip Downloader by Followerspanda goes a step further to enhance your Twitch experience. We're committed to continuous improvement, striving to create a seamless download process that caters to your needs.

How to Use Clip Downloader ?

1. First Go to the any Twitch channel from which you want to download clips.
then Click on 'Videos.'

2. After that filter the results by 'Clips.'

3. Then Click on the clip you want to download

4. You will see download button. Click on it and voila! The clip is now downloaded.

Privacy Policy:

Twitch Clip Downloader by Followerspanda prioritizes your privacy and ensures that no personal data is collected or transmitted.

In specific scenarios, non-personalized data, such as the address of the Twitch clip or a portion thereof, may be transmitted, particularly under the following circumstances:

✅ When you manually input a Twitch clip's URL for download, a request is dispatched to the originating website to facilitate the clip's download. However, it's crucial to note that we do not store any clip URLs in our database.

Here are a couple of additional assurances for your peace of mind:

✅ We do not collect any Twitch-related data or your personal data under any circumstance.

✅ We do not access any data from your Chrome browser. Our extension is designed solely to download Twitch clips and cannot perform any other operation.

At Followerspanda, we are committed to creating an environment where you can safely and effortlessly download Twitch clips. We deeply value your trust and strive relentlessly to maintain it.
